description: Plugin manager that securely loads Rust-based or sandboxed Lua/Python extensions without violating TLS/CA policies.
steps: Define plugin trait contracts (initialize, run, health_check, shutdown)
Implement sandboxing for Lua/Python adapters with capability/privilige restrictions
Ensure plugins abide by the same TLS/HTTP2 rules when they initiate outbound probes
Add a plugin registry, versioning, and lifecycle management hooks
Add plugin unit/integration tests verifying plugin failures do not crash the core scheduler
acceptance_criteria: Plugins can be added or removed without restarting the scheduler
Plugin failures are contained and logged while the main service stays healthy
